channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Appeals court overturns limits on federal agents' tactics against anti-ICE crowds in Minnesota

item.title: Greg Bovino to leave Minneapolis as Trump reshuffles leadership of immigration crackdown

item.title: Rahm Emanuel Wants to Bite the Hand of the Aged Beltway Establishment
item.description: He’s advancing the idea that one person’s wisdom garnered through age is another person’s calcified thinking.

item.title: The Scale of the Iranian Massacre Comes into View
item.description: In securing its survival through slaughter, the Iranian regime has sacrificed its tenuous remaining claims to legitimacy.

item.title: Fire Kristi Noem into the Sun
item.description: At a minimum, the DHS secretary should immediately become the least visible member of this administration.

item.title: Poland’s Nie to the Euro
item.description: It’s doing fine without it, thanks.

item.title: Don’t Wait Until You Die To Give Your Kids Their Inheritance
item.description: A dollar at 25 can change a destiny. A dollar at 55 barely moves the needle.

item.title: Trump Sends Tom Homan to Minneapolis
item.description: Dispatching Homan to the scene is, it appears, an attempt to dial down tension and reset the mission.

item.title: NASCAR Ditches Cheap Gimmicks In Favor Of A Playoff Format Focused On Racing
item.description: Most motorsports fans will find something to like in a 'new' format that echoes one from two decades ago.

item.title: Republicans Rewarding Anti-ICE Violence In Minnesota Will Incite More Violence Everywhere
item.description: If Republicans want less chaos, they need to stop rewarding it.

item.title: Republicans appeal decision that threw out NYC's only GOP-controlled House district
item.description: New York's congressional redistricting battle is headed to the state's highest court.
